players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "I find it strange that Alice was the one who was found dead last night. Let's be vigilant and keep an eye on each other during this game."
Diana: "Let's work together to uncover any suspicious behavior and eliminate potential mafia members."
You: "I agree with Charlie that we should all keep an eye out for suspicious behavior. Let's work together to ensure the safety of our village and root out any mafia members."

Charlie: "I'd like to propose that we form a pact to protect each other and work together to identify any potential mafia members. We should share any suspicious observations or behaviors we notice, and trust that everyone will act in the best interest of the village."
Diana: "Let's stick to our pact and trust each other. I, as the mafioso, will do my part to protect the village while eliminating any threats."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
